1.title: Market Research Analyst
1.job_description:
[
Kyivstar, part of Vimpelcom Group, extends the commercial analysis team.Main responsibilities will include: 
Lead multiple research projects on a day-to-day basis 
Identify opportunities for development of research process and making it valuable in strategic decision making 
Ensure implementation of the market research plan 
Manage briefing of internal clients, effective questionnaire design, data analysis, data visualization, report preparation and presentations to ensure objectives are met and meaningful insights are produced 
Interact on a frequent basis with internal clients and external research agencies 
Support procurement process ensuring strong financial discipline and accurate budgeting 
Provide ongoing internal clients support, including survey methodology, interpretation and analysis. 

Streamline comprehensive management reporting of findings and solutions from research deliverables in a concise and easy-to-understand manner 
Ideal candidate will meet following requirements: 
Higher Education in Social Science 
At least 3−4 years in research agency, Market Intelligence/Business Development/Strategic Planning/Research departments of telecom and/or FMCG companies 
Strong analytical and visualization skills, deep knowledge of statistical analysis 
Advanced English, PowerPoint and Excel, intermediate SPSS 
Responsible, strong negotiation, interpersonal, managerial and communication skills, people management 
Working at VEON demands a high standard of business ethics and adherence to our legal obligations, our values and our Code of Conduct and supporting compliance policies and procedures. Our pioneering spirit is embodied in our values to be customer obsessed, entrepreneurial, innovative, collaborative, and truthful. Being truthful requires us to act ethically, honestly, and with integrity.
]

2.title: Customer support, Risk Analyst
2.job_description:
[
PayPro Global is hiring a sharp, bilingual Risk Analyst to join our skillful Risk Management & Support team. Our new teammate will monitor, evaluate and take effective actions addressing the safety of online payments and ensuring the highest levels of security and satisfaction for shoppers all over the world.This is a high responsibility role, working closely with our international Sales, Risk Management and Account Management teams to create top quality experiences. If you are an analytical person, ready to make complex decisions, have a keen eye for details and are a skillful communicator, we look forward to welcome you to our team!Job location: Lviv, Ukraine Job type: Full time (working in shifts 24/7:morning,evening&night; shifts) Job level: Entry (0−2 years)Requirements
Advanced level of English (spoken and written)
Proficient PC and Internet user

Previous work experience in customer care or technical support (online order experience is a plus)
Experience in communicating with native speakers (FLEX Alumni, Work & Travel, AIESEC and other programs represent a big plus)
Ability to learn and act fast in a dynamic environment, with customers from all over the world
Organized working style, with an eye for detail and a problem-solving approach
Availability to work in shifts
Responsibilities
Check accounts and ongoing transactions to detect potential frauds
Analyze data and anticipate potentially fraudulent behavior
Communicate with customers (via e-mail, live chat and phone) and provide efficient support
What we’re offering
Great work environment, where professional growth and team spirit are 2 core values
Competitive salary
Benefits package include: dental insurance, office meals, yoga,guitar and English classes.
Flexible schedule
Professional development opportunities
Do you recognize yourself in our description and did our job’s content catch your attention?If the answer is Yes! simply click on «Apply now» or send your CV at [відгукнутися]. We review all applications so expect to hear from us soon.
]

3.title: Аналитик продаж
